modName: Fighters of Skyrim - LOTR - Haldir FaendalReplacer
summary:
This Mod replace an existing follower in Skyrim called Faendal.
You can now recruit Haldir from the LOTR movie
You can find him in Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
Thank you very much viewing this mod.
This Mod replace an existing follower in Skyrim called Faendal.
Use the consol command if you chose Sven at the beginning of the Story

addtofaction 5C84D 3
setrelationshiprank player 3

You can find him in Riverwood.

Galadhrim Armor + weapons: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48339/?
Weapons and armor can be crafted in the elven section in forge.
Capes can be crafted on tanning rack.

This Mod Requires ApachiiSkyHair for men.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Installation

Use NMM installer.
Or manually copy and paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

Uninstallation

Use NMM installer
Or just delete any files from this mod.

Face-Textures
I highly recommend that you use Fine Face Texture by URSHI
IN MY OPINION IS THE BEST MALE FACE-TEXTURES

Skin-Textures + Male Body Replacer
I recommend BetterMales - BodiesNudes - SundraconMeshes

They include body and hair options - read the description install your skintexture.


Covereyes is the best mod concerning eyes mod.

This Mod Requires ApachiiSkyHair.
author: italiansport
